The Swing Era - Benny Goodman Into The 70's - The King In Person

Artist
Benny Goodman
Release date
1972
Format
Vinyl
Details
LP, Compilation
Genres
Jazz

Notes

Original live & studio recordings performed by Benny Goodman from the 1950's to present (1958-1971). Includes hard cover 64 page historical book with history and credits, title same as the release. Catalog number STA 354 is on the box cover spine and inner sleeve spine; catalog number STL 354 is on the book spine and labels. Records are auto-coupled: record 1 has sides A/F; record 2 has sides B/E; record 3 has sides C/D. Runout info is etched except the [IAM in triangle] logo is stamped.
